body.head: What's New on this Site
body.p: This page records changes made since the initial 2.0b (beta) release of the resuscitated site on December 20, 2024.

list.item: Fix for minor obscure JavaScript bug on search page.
Selecting counties in the search page now causes the city/town checkbox list to be filtered, showing only cities and towns from the selected counties.
If the number of search results found is 50 or below, a link will appear offering to view the entire set of search results as a single-page collection.
Various style tweaks.
Change from (before) and (after) to (or earlier) and (or later) for date suffix rendering.
Full expansions of date suffixes on every record page
Corrections to rendering of date suffixes
Addition of alphabetic links to Sources, Feather, and Abbreviations table pages
Insertion of original BBTI logo on home page
Addition of some missing abbreviations
A feature enabling users to create subcollections and share them via simple URLs
A responsive navigation menu, and other optimizations for display on small-format devices
A Tools page
Improved schema constraints for the TEI
A placeholder favicon
Table of abbreviations added
John Feather's bibliography linked from the Sources page
Updates to the stylesheet to better support small-format devices such as phones and tablets
How to Help page
This page ("What's New on this Site")
Some work on tightening the TEI schema (much more to be done there)
Many minor corrections to typographical and capitalization errors in the data
